entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 45
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 3 Photos from the special event 1988-1017 Talk to Sahaja Yogis, Navarātri Celebrations (7th Day), India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 3 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 4 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1988.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, November 2023

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, November 2023

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month new Photos were uploaded to 12 Pūjas as follows.
(i) 1913-0000 Pūjā (crown, jewelry and main Throne with one red and white line border), Maharashtra, India: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1913.
(ii) 1981-0407 Śhrī Gṛuhalakṣhmī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Australia 1981.
(iii) 1983-0107 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 3 medium resolutions uploaded, link India 1983.
(iv) 1984-0114 Makar Saṅkrānti Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1984.
(v) 1984-0908 Śhrī Mary Mahālakṣhmī Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link Germany 1984.
(vi) 1985-0531 Śhrī Devī Pūjā: 6 high resolutions uploaded, link U.S.A. 1985.
(vii) 1986-0114 Makar Saṅkrānti Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1986.
(viii) 1987-0103 Śhrī Nirmalā Devī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1987.
(ix) 1987-0419 Easter Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1987.
(x) 1988-0521 Pūjā: 13 high resolutions uploaded, link Spain 1988.
(xi) 1988-1113 Diwālī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link UK 1988.
(xii) 1988-1217 Pūjā: 2 highs resolution uploaded, link India 1988.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 25: Moments of Joy Displays

link.title: Photos Post 25: Moments of Joy Displays

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention the new folder Moments of Joy Displays of the main webpage of Eternal Moments which has 3 art galleries started: Architecture, Dances, and Decorative Arts. Other galleries, such as Fine Arts and Music, are as well under consideration.
Please kindly share the update with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 24: Updates
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to bring to your attention the following updates:

1. Among the current 34 Collections, the Photos of 19 Named Collections are downloadable and the Photos of 2 other Named Collections will be made downloadable as soon as a good number of their Photos are replaced by recently scanned Photos of higher quality and resolution. The Photos of the remaining 13 Collections, including the XYZKnown and XYZUnknown Collections, will not be downloadable for the time (did not get permission).

2. The new folder Temporary Displays of the main webpage of Eternal Moments has 3 galleries: Chronology Last 1 to 30 Days, Chronology Last 31 to 60 Days, and Chronology Last 61 to 108 Days. So, each Photo uploaded to a Collection, besides being collated to the corresponding gallery in the Countries Folder, will be also collated in Chronology Last 1 to 30 Days for the first 30 days, then moved to Chronology Last 31 to 60 Days for the next 30 days, then moved to Chronology Last 61 to 108 Days for the next 48 days, before being finally moved to the corresponding gallery of the Chronology Folder.

3. The folder Permanent Displays of the main webpage of Eternal Moments has 4 galleries. The first 3 galleries, called Crowns, Incomplete Titles, and Lotus Feet are complete ONLY outside the period 1982 to 2009: they will be completed in due time. The 4th gallery called Processions has been completed. The first, second and fourth galleries have been maintained as folders on CCT's hard drives from the very beginning (i.e., from September 2018) to facilitate its work on titling, dating, and sequentializing of the images, and it has been felt that many could benefit from them as well.

Please kindly share the updates with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
